attributes.action: life means life for sex affenders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: today 4/6/2009 i here again i man convicted of 2 rapes and over 20 other sexual assaults is given life, WAIT FOR IT. he must serve a min of 7 and half years . what a joke
